kw.name: Suite Setup
Open Test Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.
เปิด Browser สำหรับการทดสอบ
Setup สำหรับ test suite

test.name: SMOKE-001: Page Load Test

kw.name: Test Setup
Navigate To Registration Page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
ไปยังหน้า Event Registration
Setup สำหรับแต่ละ test case

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Test Teardown
Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Clear All Form Fields
Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
ล้างข้อมูลทุกช่องในฟอร์ม
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.
Teardown สำหรับแต่ละ test case

test.doc: ทดสอบการโหลดหน้าเว็บ

kw.name: Fill Form Field
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Submit Registration Form

kw.name: Verify Success Page
Wait Until Location Contains
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
รอจนกว่า URL จะมีข้อความที่กำหนด

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Thank you for participating in our event'.
kw.arg: Thank you for participating in our event
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
ตรวจสอบหน้า Success
